# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is PARROT.
<ROUND i="1 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT> Hello everyone! Let's try to cooperate and see what happens. </CHAT>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
PARROT: Hello everyone! Let's try to cooperate and see what happens.
HORSE: Hi everyone, let's cooperate!
FROG: Hello everyone, let's aim for a good outcome this round!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> You have 20 coins in your pocket. Choose how many to contribute to the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). The pot multiplier is 1.9×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 10 </CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="40" multiplied_contrib="76.0" active_players="3" redistributed_each="25.3"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> HORSE=20,FROG=10 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per unit, 4 coins to impose a deduction of 12.0 coins. Choose whom to punish and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
<PUNISHMENT> {} </PUNISHMENT>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"PARROT (YOU)":{"coins_spent_on_punish":0,"coins_deducted_from_you":0,"payoff":35},"HORSE":{"coins_spent_on_punish":0,"coins_deducted_from_them":0,"payoff":25},"FROG":{"coins_spent_on_punish":0,"coins_deducted_from_them":0,"payoff":35}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="2 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
HORSE: Let's continue to cooperate.
FROG: Let's try contributing 10 again, as it worked well last round!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
<ROUND_INFO> You have 20 coins in your pocket. Choose how many to contribute to the shared pot (integer from 0 to 20). The pot multiplier is 1.9×. </ROUND_INFO>
<CONTRIB> 10 </CONTRIB>

<MECHANISM_INFO> It will cost you, per unit, 4 coins to impose a deduction of 12.0 coins. Choose whom to punish and by how many units. </MECHANISM_INFO>
<PUNISHMENT> {} </PUNISHMENT>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"PARROT (YOU)":{"coins_spent_on_punish":0,"coins_deducted_from_you":0,"payoff":35},"HORSE":{"coins_spent_on_punish":0,"coins_deducted_from_them":0,"payoff":25},"FROG":{"coins_spent_on_punish":0,"coins_deducted_from_them":0,"payoff":35}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="3 of 6">
<CHAT_STAGE> Would you like to send a message to the group? You may stay silent. </CHAT_STAGE>
<CHAT> Let's keep contributing 10. </CHAT>
<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
PARROT: Let's keep contributing 10.
HORSE: Let's keep it up!
FROG: Let's keep it to the 10 coins contribution. It feels like a stable choice.
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>

<ROUND i="4 of 6">

HORSE: Still cooperating!
FROG: Let's stick with 10 again - it seems to be working.
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>

<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
PARROT: Let's go for 10 once more.
HORSE: Let's finish strong with full cooperation!
FROG: Let's go for 10 again - one last round!
</CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>

</ROUND>
<ROUND i="6 of 6">

<CHAT_TRANSCRIPT>
PARROT: Let's stick to 10 for the final round!

FROG: It was a good run, everyone! Thanks for cooperating.
